General.Name: Hangzhou Bio-Sincerity Pharma-Tech Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Hangzhou Bio-Sincerity Pharma-Tech Co.,Ltd. operates as a pharmaceutical technology research and development and services company in China. The company primarily provides drug research and development services; and the transformation of research and development technology results for various pharmaceutical, as well as pharmaceutical research and development investment companies. Its business covers the principal links of drug discovery, pharmaceutical research, clinical trials, customized research and development and production, and registration applications. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.
